answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The basis of therapy of AF are treating the underlying heart disease, restoring the rhythm, maintaining the rhythm and anticoagulation to prevent complication. For restoring the rhythm medications like Flecanide are used. Without rhythm control, the main complication is increased ventricular rate. Also, exercise tolerance is better with rhythm control. So, based on your present clinical symptoms and AF status, therapy can be planned. So, please don't worry and discuss the possibilities with your consulting doctor.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
